properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 3 at 5:19AM MST until February 3 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph becoming West by midday.
Gusts of 40 to 50 mph at times.

* WHERE...Canyonlands/Natural Bridges and Southeast Utah.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of light snow showers is likely to
combine with these strong winds Monday. Lowered visibility will
create hazardous driving conditions at times.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart
disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay
indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion
due to wind-blown dust.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
